channel.title: Need help Should i realease this source?
channel.description:
[size=18pt]HavocWorld Created By Kyle[/size]
HavocWorld A pvp 317 that uses trendscape client ...
Cammypvp was the origonal source but now its been upped and change quite a bit from Cammypvp-kingV3-and now Havocworld I also created kingv3 so i have been changing this source for over a couple months not too much work put in but over time i think its grown nicely I am realeasing it cause i cant keep it up 24/7 on my computer but yah alot of people say how it is the coolest server ever ! and one of the best they have played...
Creator - kyle 30% for adding the home in partyroom and All the other pkpoint system and Alot more!
Creators of cammypvp The rest of the 70%
Origonal Home
[IMG]http://i998.photobucket.com/albums/af102/holo1113/KingPVPhome2.jpg[/img]
Home 2 for any reason u don't like home 1
[IMG]http://i998.photobucket.com/albums/af102/holo1113/KingPVPhome.jpg[/img]
Shops sell items that cost pk points to wear...
[IMG]http://i998.photobucket.com/albums/af102/holo1113/KingPVPShops5Pk.jpg[/img]
all PkP Shops
[IMG]http://i998.photobucket.com/albums/af102/holo1113/KingPVPShops1500all.jpg[/img]
Multi pvp zone for home1
[IMG]http://i998.photobucket.com/albums/af102/holo1113/KingPVPMultiareahome2.jpg[/img]
Multi for home 2
[IMG]http://i998.photobucket.com/albums/af102/holo1113/KingPVPmultihome1.jpg[/img]
A pk point shop
[IMG]http://i998.photobucket.com/albums/af102/holo1113/KingPVPshopsforpkpoints.jpg[/img]
Highscores
[IMG]http://i998.photobucket.com/albums/af102/holo1113/KingPVPhighscores.jpg[/img]
Fun pk the portals and the wall was taken out so u can just walk out into funpk
[IMG]http://i998.photobucket.com/albums/af102/holo1113/KingPVPClanwars.jpg[/img]
[size=18pt]Should i release this server out to everyone? [/size]

item.title: Need help Should i realease this source?
item.dc:creator: @mrdrzj mrdrzj
item.description:
@mrdrzj wrote:

its up to you
if you would like to use that source for your own server
then you should not release it.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help Should i realease this source?
